Primary Contact: Norm Barton, Communications Unit Coordinator; Phone: 250.861.0635; Email: ve7bzc@rac.ca
Alternate Contact: Ian McLaughlin, Alternate Communications Unit Coordinator; Phone: 250.765.6713; Email: ian@platinum.net
Service Details: - Provides emergency backup radio communications to the Central Okanagan Emergency Plan/Kelowna Emergency Operations Centre - Operated by Volunteer Amateur (Ham) Radio Operators registered through Emergency Management BC (EMBC)
Eligibility: Minimum volunteer requirements: - Basic Amateur (Ham) Radio Certificate - Registration with Emergency Management BC (EMBC/PEP Radio Volunteer Card) - Local registration available (ve7bzc@rac.ca) for the EMBC/PEP Card and the CORD Emergency Plan Radio Team - For ages 16-18, a parent's signature is required
